thread.title: Chuck Todd: ‘Where Was the Speech to America’ from Trump on Health Care?
thread.title_full: Chuck Todd: ‘Where Was the Speech to America’ from Trump on Health Care?

author: Josh Feldman
title: Chuck Todd: ‘Where Was the Speech to America’ from Trump on Health Care?
text:
Chuck Todd: ‘Where Was the Speech to America’ from Trump on Health Care? by Josh Feldman | 5:36   
Before the health care bill was pulled from the House floor today, Sean Spicer said that President Trump “left everything on the field” on this. Chuck Todd was a bit confused by that one this afternoon. 
He asked Chris Jansing , “Where was the speech to America?” 
Jansing talked about what Trump did behind-the-scenes on health care, but acknowledged that Trump wasn’t vociferously selling the American Health Care Act as much as other Republicans were. 
Watch above, via MSNBC.
